message:
SYSTEM: ISSGC08.pdf: Página 15
©<Miembro Grupo>
16
Job submission
• High heterogeneity of computational resources:
– Different types of machines, OS, requirements for submission, 
memory, cores, duration of the tasks, etc.
• Abstraction is needed for submitting jobs
– JSDL: Job Submission Description Language
– OGF standard
– Every system has its own submission language
• JSDL
– XML based
– Defines the job requirements (type of processor, OS, memory, etc.) and 
parameters (inputs, outputs, etc.)
– It is not possible to submit jobs directly to resources
speaker: SYSTEM
